GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.18.11
GSD.description:
ARM: meson: Fix refcount leak in meson_smp_prepare_cpus

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.11 by commit c5fbf4f74c94fd60d5e9bf9f7f8268c3601562ca, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit d850f3e5d2966e5c9eb55f66181cee960737e04c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: meson: Fix refcount leak in meson_smp_prepare_cpus
